meanings.definition: The state or quality of being pulpy.
meanings.sent1: The pulpiness of the orange made it easy to squeeze out the juice.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the pulpiness of fresh fruit in my smoothies.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the pulpiness of the tomato made it look like a tiny brain.
meanings.sent4: The pulpiness of the paper towel soaked up the spilled water quickly.
meanings.sent5: The pulpiness of the mashed bananas added a delightful texture to the cake batter.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a soft, moist, and slightly fibrous texture.
meanings.sent1: The pulpiness of the peach made it a juicy and delicious snack.
meanings.sent2: The pulpiness of the bread made it perfect for soaking up the soup.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed puzzled by the pulpiness of the wet food in its bowl.
meanings.sent4: The pulpiness of the sponge made it ideal for cleaning up spills.
meanings.sent5: The pulpiness of the cotton candy melted in my mouth like sweet clouds.
